subject: Olympic Games
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Olympic leaders meeting in Lausanne, Switzerland, agreed to make drug testing independent of sports organizations and are asking the World Anti-Doping Agency to take over responsibility for testing on a global level.
snippet: Olympic leaders meeting in Lausanne, Switzerland, agreed to make drug testing independent of sports organizations and are asking the World Anti-Doping Agency to take over responsibility for testing on a global level.
